page.title: 02A day in a child's life
page.content: I get up at 8.00,have my breakfast and go to the bathroom and brush my teeth.When I am dressed I brush my hair and my mum takes me to school in the car.I go to the playground and play ball until the whistle goes.We line up and lead into class.When we are inside I take off my shoes and lead into assembly where we hear a story and sing a hymn.After assembly we go to class and do maths until break time.At break I eat my crisps.We then do some English.At 11.30 we go swimming until dinner time.We have a small break,have our dinner and then play until the whistle goes.We do Topic until break time and then have singing.School ends at 3.45. I then go to the school swimming club. I go home and have my tea.Then I go out to play and when I have to go to bed I have a wash and brush my teeth.
